pages.title: Chocobos Attack
pages.text: Chocobos will Attack you if you Attack them. $(br) They drop Leather, feathers, Forbidden Drumsticks, & possibly their Spawn egg.$(br)Chocobos Help out Chocobos.

pages.title: Chocobos & Walls/Fences
pages.text: Chocobos can get stuck on the inside corner of walls /fence corners
